titleStmt.title: An antidote against foure dangerous qu√¶ries, pretended to be propounded to the reverend Assemblie of Divines, touching suspension from the Sacrament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed according to order, for Nathaniell Webb,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Prynne, William. Foure serious questions of grand importance, concerning excommunication, and suspention from the Sacrament (Wing P3959).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Sept. 2d Mr Prin 1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
